bibl.title: The Arabian Gulf in Antiquity. Volume I. From Prehistory to the Fall of the Achaemenid Empire; - Volume II. From Alexander the Great to the Coming of Islam.
bibl.note: 8 tabl., 44 figg., 1 carte et 12 pll.; - xxii-369 pp., 2 tabl., 25 figg., 1 carte et 12 pll.
Voir II, pp. 91-92: utilise le témoignage de P. Cairo Zenon IV, 59536; I, 59009.
POTTS Daniel T., The Arabian Gulf in Antiquity. Volume I. From Prehistory to the Fall of the Achaemenid Empire; - Volume II. From Alexander the Great to the Coming of Islam.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1990, 8°, xxviii-419 pp., 8 tabl., 44 figg., 1 carte et 12 pll.; - xxii-369 pp., 2 tabl., 25 figg., 1 carte et 12 pll. ISBN 0-19-814390-7; - 0-19-814391-5.
